website_summaries.verdict: Vera Bradley fans will love the features and beautiful design this well-made wristlet has to offer; but the bright colors and fabric material isn't for everyone.
pros: Sports the precise stitching and pretty patterns that are signatures of the brand
Zippered compartment, card slots, and space for most cell phones
cons: A few owners didn't receive the print they ordered
The zipper has been known to stick

customer_reviews.title: Metal zipper not great
customer_reviews.text: First off I love Vera Bradley everything and have several wallets like this. I love that it holds everything I need to run into a store plus it holds my iPhone 7. The only problem with this one is the think metal zipper they used. It does not slide well being such a heave metal zipper instead of the nylon. I'm hoping I'll break it in and it will fix itself or I'll be returning it. That being said the colors are beautiful. I bought the matchup my Glenna bag as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: The ID window is also protected
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice wallet but it isn't going to work for what I purchased it for. The Rfid also protects the ID window. I need to remove my work ID (Which has the chip) out of the front ID window so I can swipe it on the reader. I need to unzip the wallet to retrieve the ID. It is very good quality and it does exactly what it is supposed to do. It protects the credit cards. It hold my Iphone6 real nicely. I just wish the ID slot could have access from outside of the wallet.
customer_reviews.author: PoolFixer

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a Harry Potter wallet from Walmart for a while now (which was amazing, but I decided I needed an upgrade.) This wallet makes me feel feminine and stylish, and it has plenty of space! I’ve seen reviews that the zipper doesn’t work well or it doesn’t hold their phone well. I just opened it up, but the zipper isn’t hard at all and it isn’t metal like most people are saying. It seems to be genuine Vera Bradley. My phone is a standard iPhone 11, and it fits in the pocket just fine. Very pleased with the product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Windsorsmith9

customer_reviews.title: Light, compact & everything I need!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect buy! I had an older version of this for years until it completely wore out. I attached it to my keys with a long lanyard so I never lost my keys or wallet because they were together. Over the years, I tried other wallets but I was never fully satisfied. I bought a bigger wallet from Target that managed to fall out of my jacket pocket! Thankfully the police found it, but that was enough for me to realize I needed to go back to this fantastic wallet. The new feature is the cell phone pocket! It fits my iPhone 6s perfectly with a basic silicone case.
customer_reviews.author: KBL786

customer_reviews.title: This Wristlet is Perfect for Me!
customer_reviews.text: This Vera Bradley Wristlet is perfect for me. My credit cards and ID are protected and my iphone 6 fits in it even with the Otter case that I have on it. It's very well made and I love the pretty design that Vera Bradley always offers. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Midge

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this wallet, but... 1. Very stiff 2. If cash is in the cash slot it's hard to zip shut 3. Zipper is very stiff 4. Change doesnt really fit in change pouch. A few can fit but then it doesnt close if you put to many. 5. I wish they would show what the reverse side pattern was. I loved the berries but the inside pattern, I am not fond of.
customer_reviews.author: Dreyc + HaileyJ

customer_reviews.title: Love love love VB wristlet
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th VB cellphone wristlet I have purchased. My iPhone XR fits perfect in the cell phone slot. There is plenty of space for credit cards, ID, etc.. a small zip pocket for loose change... and of course a place for paper money. Absolutely worth every penny! And they come in a variety of colors and patterns! Great alternative to carrying a handbag.
customer_reviews.author: I'm Broke, Thanks AmazonPrime

customer_reviews.title: Solid wallet, troublesome zipper
customer_reviews.text: I just received this wallet today and my initial reaction is very pleased! It looks cute and the colors are bright. There is plenty of space inside and it looks like it will last a year or two. My iPhone 8 fits, but I would be sure to read dimensions for your own phone. Only problem is a difficult-to-move zipper, but some WD40 helped.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is absolutely terrible
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this wallet and the accordion wristlet to compare. The Smartphone wristlet is smaller and held my IPhone 8 with having a case on it and a pop socket attached to the back. I do not like the snap that holds the phone. The wristlet holds like 8 cards which was nice but couldn’t hold my keys. The zipper like many of the reviews have stated is very poor quality and ultimately why I decided to return. It does not zip with ease and gets caught almost every time I tried to close it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel R

customer_reviews.title: Zipper sticks
customer_reviews.text: This is cute an all!! But after about a weeks use the zipper sticks every time I use it. Not really happy with that. Also the delivery was pushed back several days
customer_reviews.author: KJV

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is because the zipper is hard to open at times and seems stuck. My previous wallets did the same thing but I bought another pattern anyways because everything else about this wallet I love! Fits my iPhone 6s and my daughters iPhone 8 including a case perfectly! It has just enough slots for IDs and cards etc. Not too many or too few.The colors are pretty and I always get compliments on anything I buy from Vera Bradley. The wrist strap is a must.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cellphone and wallet items
customer_reviews.text: This was a purchase of an item I've carried for years. Different fabric pattern, but the same wallet. I love being able to carry my phone along with my wallet contents, especially in this Covid-19 crisis. I carry only necessary items, and this wallet fits the bill for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Nancystitcher

customer_reviews.title: Nice all in one
customer_reviews.text: Love Vera Bradley wallets because they allow for your phone, keys and cards to be all in one spot. This is the second one I’ve owned and I few like there is ample room for the few cards I use most often. My only complaints are the zipper section isn’t adequate for keeping any change, and if you tend to have a lot of money it’s hard to zip.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah kaufman

customer_reviews.title: This is a knockoff
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this wristlet in Desert Rose. It didn’t seem right when I got it so I wert to the Vera Bradley site. The one I received has a big clunky silver zipper. The real ones have a smooth plastic zipper. Mine has stitching in an oblong diamond pattern. Real ones have a square diamond pattern. Mine has a loop to put the snap closure through. The real one has no loop.Overall quality is way below real Vera Bradley. Some of the patterns offered here appear to be authentic, but many are not. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Stremanos

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing: Lower Quality Than I Would Expect
customer_reviews.text: When the item arrived, it had some kind of sticky, chocolate-like substance on the corner of it that I can't get off. At first glance, it appeared as if someone might have owned it before me. An additional minor concern is that there is another small substance in the ID pouch. I wouldn't be so picky about that except that Vera Bradley is so expensive and reputable. As well, the zipper is very rigid and hard to move. Overall, I'm disappointed from, like I said, such an expensive and reputable company.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Hinkson

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a snug fit for your iPhone 7+
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute and has plenty of room for credit cards and such. However, I had to remove the cover from my iPhone 7+ to get it to fit, and even then, it barely fit. I do wish the phone storage part zipped instead of snapped. It would also have been nice to have had a place to store a key.
customer_reviews.author: Old Blush

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for concerts and sporting events
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! My Samsung J7 Crown fits perfectly, even with case. I'm using this to go to concerts and sporting events, as it is stadium-approved according to the NFL guidelines. The zip part of the wallet is flexible enough to hold a small lipstick,earplugs and tissues in addition to my credit card, ID and cash. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, too small for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: This item is so pretty, although it is too small for my needs. Just cannot understand why they don't make it just a little bit larger so that a smart phone can be attached or put inside. Trying to simplify my grab and go items when leaving the house and this didn't work for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think it’s a knock off
customer_reviews.text: I have had several Vera Bradley wallets and wristlets. This thing is so cheap feeling, I am sending it back and ordering directly from the Vera Bradley website. It’s also very very small
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Perry

customer_reviews.title: Fits LG Enact
customer_reviews.text: I finally upgraded from the older, smaller version. Quality is as expected from Vera Bradley. I like that the ID slot on the back has the opening on the inside zippered section. I don't think the inside placement of the coin pocket will hold a lot of change. It fits my LG Enact phone with case which was my main reason for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fits the iPhone XR
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fan of the Bramble pattern. The wallet has plenty room & easy to grab on the go. After reading the reviews, I was skeptical about my phone fitting. Luckily, my iPhone XR fits perfect with a slim case. The only minor complaint I have is the zipper is stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Pall

customer_reviews.title: It’s just right
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet, it has lots of card slots, a place for my phone and a wristlet strap if I don’t want to lug the whole purse with me!
customer_reviews.author: pinkbasket

customer_reviews.title: Daughter birthday gift.  She loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter a minimalist loves it. All in one small. Holds Phone, debt card, ID, credit card, comb. Has place for cash, but she really doesn't carry cash.
customer_reviews.author: TSO

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED VERY QUICKLY!!
customer_reviews.text: My wallet arrived so quickly, just in time for my daughter's birthday tomorrow. Thank you so much, Hollywood Ornaments!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue O

customer_reviews.title: Great little cell-phone wristlet
customer_reviews.text: Impeccable Vera Bradley product. Zippers work great. Snaps work great. My smartphone w/cover fits perfectly. Absolutely thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: WT

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Was looking for something to fit in my jacket pocket, & while this is a bit larger than what I was looking for, it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for simple days
customer_reviews.text: This is such a lovely pattern; disappointed that it is discontinued. I am very happy with the price, and it works great for holding android mobiles. With my mobile in the wallet, it doesn't weigh heavy or hurt my wrist. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Umsarica

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Feelings
customer_reviews.text: Mixed feelings about this wristlet. I already have one of these and love it. Love the pattern on this one, but do not like that the ID window is now on the outside. I realize that is just a personal preference, but for me, that is the reason that I will not use it. Will continue to use my old one. I really wish VB had given us options in that regard....
customer_reviews.author: BnMillbrook

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Christmas gift for a teenager with a cell phone she is glued to. She's going to love this! It's what she asked for. I saved money!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: really good quality....
customer_reviews.text: Really good price for Vera Bradley and quality. I love it makes my life much easier when I just have to run out to the store or anywhere. I don't have to lug my bulky purse with me cause this smartphone wallet holds everything I need. Very Good Product..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wristlet thats holds alot
customer_reviews.text: I am a HUGE fan of Vera Bradley and this wristlet is the cutest and roomy fits many cards and perfect fit for my iphone 8.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Super cute.  Super functional.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great size. iPhone X fits perfectly. Snaps good. Holds all my cards and doesn’t get too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Rummy3

customer_reviews.title: A very useful small purse to carry all the necessities without a big hand bag.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my smart phone. It fits perfectly. There is a zipper inside for change and places for charge cards.
customer_reviews.author: lauramf

customer_reviews.title: Great little wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Love my Vera items. This is perfect. Holds my ID, my cards, and money securely in the zipper section and my iPhone X fits perfectly in the outer section even with a thin case on it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: compact
customer_reviews.text: Although this larger size was needed for my larger phone, it is still more compact for carrying everything I need at once. Well made and easy to transfer from one purse to another or use independently.
customer_reviews.author: Meri Shadley

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Great size to carry independently or in a purse. Plenty of room for cards, cash, phone, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Frock

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It’s what I wanted. The colors are great and the zipper is nice and smooth
customer_reviews.author: Girl Spires

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Just came in the mail today. You can tell that this is a cheaper Vera Bradley product but it seems well and it works perfectly for me it's exactly what I wanted I got the $30 Brown phone case wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Erin NOEL

customer_reviews.title: Great style
customer_reviews.text: I really like the style and patterns on this. Also my iPhone 6 fits in nicely & stays put. Also like itgat the wristlet wallet is smaller and great to take with you. Doesn't take up much room in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Bloomer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but zipper snags on the flap
customer_reviews.text: I love the fabric, it matches the new purse that I just bought. I don't like the zipper, it hangs up just past the snap flap. It needed a smaller zipper that still zips smoothly. This is a design flaw, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Spinnin Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Fits all the essentials
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Mother’s Day because my mom hates carrying around a big purse. This fits her credit cards, cash and iPhone 7. She loves it! A very easy and compact way to grab your belongings and be out the door. The pattern is also very pretty and the fabric is thick and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Clemente

customer_reviews.title: Great wristlet
customer_reviews.text: Not usually a Vera Bradley lover but I do like this pattern. iPhone 6 fits nicely and secure areas for credit cards
customer_reviews.author: Lori G.

customer_reviews.title: Zipper hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Wallet size is good. Holds iPhone 8 well in the designated pocket. RFID protection. Only gave it 3 stars because the zipper does not work smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: iPhone 8 fits with a case
customer_reviews.text: My iPhone 8 fits nice and snug with an Otterbox Defender case on it. 8 credit card slots + a slot for your drivers license. It is perfect for what I need!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a Vera Bradley and when I saw one , I just had to have it. Saving up for my purse.
customer_reviews.author: E Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, Great Price1
customer_reviews.text: Everything I wanted and more. Great colors plenty of pockets. Had to replace my Paisley one.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.Chu

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Its a great wallet but i stopped using it because i liked the smaller one i bought better. Its great quality though and love the design
customer_reviews.author: amy a

customer_reviews.title: Vera Bradley Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love this Vera Bradley Wallet it made very well and has many compartments excellent wallet
customer_reviews.author: Dolly

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, bad zipper, probably just a knock off
customer_reviews.text: this was not a real vera bradley. the zipper was really cheap and kept getting hung up. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Candace L. Hamblin

customer_reviews.title: Too Small!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice wristlet, but unfortunately it’s too small for my iPhone 8+. Will be sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Lori H.

customer_reviews.title: Sticky Zipper
customer_reviews.text: The zipper gets stuck on the first turn it has to make. It took me quite a while to get it to go passed that space. I am hoping that it stuck just because it had not been opened before. If it continues I will be returning it
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for 6S Plus
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love!!! Perfect for all of my cards and fits my 6S Plus perfectly with my case!! Bright colors and the leather strap makes carrying it very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Selfklan6

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it just small one or two inches would have been perfect. Beautifully colors
customer_reviews.author: lucy garrison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Wristlet.
customer_reviews.text: I loved loved loved this. Everything about it. Size was perfect. Styling perfect. Pattern of course is gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: ravenalexs

customer_reviews.title: Love the design
customer_reviews.text: Love the design however iPhone 6 Plus w slim case will not fit.
customer_reviews.author: A. marshall

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty pattern. Zipper could be a little smoother but in general good product. Fits my Samsung Galaxy 7.
customer_reviews.author: Jenreshe

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby got this for my birthday! Love it! This IS my purse and I have always used these to carry everything I need. This one fits my phone in the outside pocket - LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of College Students, Daughter of Mom with a Disability

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can throw it in my purse but also that I can just grab the wristlet and go without the bulky purse.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but doesn’t fit iPhone 7 Plus
customer_reviews.text: Product is pretty and well made.... but it does not fit an iPhone 7Plus. I had to return it. Sadly, I haven’t been able to find any Vera Bradley wristlet to fit this size phone.
customer_reviews.author: RainLvr

customer_reviews.title: Fits iPhone even in waterproof case.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Hold my iPhone easily even on a water proof case.
customer_reviews.author: SarahO

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My teenage daughter loves it. Her phone fits in it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor zipper
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect but the zipper keeps getting stuck
customer_reviews.author: E. Canzoneri

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 2 years and is holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Perfection! My iPhone 8s with a case fits perfectly. Not having to carry a purse but having everything I need with me...can’t get better than that. I just clip my keys on and go!

customer_reviews.title: Functional wristlet
customer_reviews.text: The print is pretty and the size is good. Loved that they incorporated vinyl for the trimming and an ID window. What I found disappointing was the roughness of the zipper, which I hope will lessen with use.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves the design and holds so much including iphone 6

customer_reviews.title: ❤️it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet, the the print, size, love that it’s a wristlet & that it fits my phone since I don’t always like carrying a purse, the rfid technology, card spots & spaces & the window on the outside for ID. I do however prefer the coin spot being on the outside rather than in because it’s a bit tight.

customer_reviews.title: Too small for Galaxy S8+

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wallet the colors are bright and it's exactly what I wanted. It holds my Google Pixel 2 XL without a case. It also has plenty of pockets to hold all my cards and money! I definitely recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Great price!

customer_reviews.title: Fits cell phone perfectly!

customer_reviews.title: My phone fit perfect and plenty of room for other items
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I had been looking for. My phone fit perfect and plenty of room for other items. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: SGP. Dallas, TX

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Pretty and holds my Galaxy S9 perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Pretty and holds my Galaxy S9 perfect. I love that there's a snap (not velcro or anything) for the phone part. Feels very secure and I use it as a wallet and a wristlet.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne K

customer_reviews.title: Check the size before you order.
customer_reviews.text: Will be returning it. Smaller than expected my iphone did not fit. Love the rfid feature.

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: Love the color/ style/design. Only dislike- phone doesn’t fit with a case on it. Just needs to be slightly larger.

customer_reviews.title: Very organized
customer_reviews.text: Perfect wristlet cell phone, money credit cards. Had to take phone out of its case to fit.

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is nice. Wish the zipper was made from a different material.

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. It has all of the room for my credit cards and cash. It also has a zipper around all of it so I don't have to worry about things falling out. My phone fits perfectly and it meets all of my needs.

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife, happy life! Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what my wife wanted. It holds her iPhone X and all of her cards and such. She is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Y.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased it for a gift and the recepient had it ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for a gift and the recepient had it 2 days (after return date) and handle clasp broke. So disappointing for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Scudder

customer_reviews.title: I did great in the gift department
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my mom an she loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is very difficult to open and close
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and pattern but the zipper is very difficult to open and close. I expected better quality from Vera Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Love this wristlet
customer_reviews.text: This was a good investment I can carry my phone and credit cards without having to carry a purse.. you can also hook ur keys on it as well..

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It was a little smaller than I thought it was. But that doesn't matter because my friend loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Fun, pretty, functional wallet
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet! I already have one in another color and I’m giving this one as a gift. I love that my phone fits in it and I can grab this without taking my big purse when I feel like it!

customer_reviews.text: Generous I.D./credit card holder places, pockets that hold everything my larger wallet carries & a place for my phone all in the same place!!! Love it!!!

customer_reviews.title: I Love it, my iPhone 8 fits in there perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I Love it, my iPhone 8 fits in there perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Space for everything!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it. Plenty of spots for ID and cards. Unzips for easy access to cards, dollar spot and small zip area for coins. My iPhone 8 fits perfectly with otter case in outside slot.

customer_reviews.title: I got the coral one! It’s too cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love mine it is so cute and useful. So glad I bought this!

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!

customer_reviews.text: The reason for the 3 starts is the crappy and annoying zipper. Only because of this I will not purchase again or recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Matches my tote bag I already have. I wanted something with the ID window on the outside, a place for my cell phone, and so this was perfect.

customer_reviews.text: Great product. Tight fit on her LG G7 but works well.

customer_reviews.text: Good size. My cell phone fit perfectly in the side pocket. Zipper is a little hard to work.

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet/Phonecase
customer_reviews.text: I really love this wallet, it has plenty of card slots and holds my phone perfectly!

customer_reviews.title: Love to leave purse in car and grab wristlet for shopping.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for everything when you don’t need to bring the big bag.

customer_reviews.text: so cute, but tiny! there's no way an iphone plus will fit!

customer_reviews.title: It  is exactly what I wanted!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas present and was the perfect request from my grand-daughter----and also the perfect selection!!Thanks again, Amazon.....
customer_reviews.author: Nana D

product_meta.title: Vera Bradley Women's Signature Cotton Smartphone Wristlet with RFID Protection
product_meta.description:
Vera Bradley has unified the style of a purse and the functionality of a wallet to give you this sophisticated wristlet. The RFID Smartphone Wristlet is the fashionable solution for storing your everyday essentials – measuring 3.25 inches high, 6.25 inches wide, and 2 inches in diameter with a 6 inch removable wristlet strap. 

The fully lined interior eight card slips, one slip pocket, one bill pocket, and an ID window, so you can have fashion and functionality on the go. Easily remove the wristlet strap to throw in your bag for separate organization. This slim silhouette is roomy enough for you to securely stow your phone, lipstick, keys, and credit cards.
